div.head: 吐酸臭水
div.div: vomiting of sour and foul water

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: vomiting of sour and foul water

sense.def: Illness Sign of vomiting of liquids that have a sour flavor and a foul odor. Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 Substance Entry zhang cai 樟材：味辛，温，無毒。主惡氣，中惡心腹痛，鬼注，霍亂，腹脹， 宿食不消，常吐酸臭水。酒煮服之。無藥處用之 , “Acrid flavor, warm, no poison. It controls malign qi, being struck by the malign with heart and abdominal pain, demon influx, cholera, abdominal distension, food that remains in the body overnight without being digested, and frequent vomiting of sour and foul water ”.
